website_summaries.verdict: A high-quality, EMG-powered guitar at a mid-range price. Good value for the money.
pros: Aesthetically pleasing guitar with EMG pickups for a powerhouse sound
cons: Very rare complaints about fret quality

customer_reviews.title: Wow...
customer_reviews.text: Like the others have said, this is an amazing deal (thanks Amazon). It appears to be a 1-off guitar from Schecter, very close to their Damien Elite-6 model, but with a special inlay in the neck. The pickups are great, the overal fit & finish is top notch. Mine has a little buzz but just needs a little relief in the neck. If you've never tried the EMG 85/81, get this and enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: TkMods

customer_reviews.title: Love this guitar!
customer_reviews.text: I am just beyond a beginner guitar player but have been around music, bands and studios all my life. Purchased this guitar on Christmas Day for a ridiculously low price so I had my reservations. The guitar arrived and I was blown away. First off it looks great, sounds great and plays really really well. I would have never ended up with Schecter had the price not been this low but I would not think twice before buying another Schecter now. Oh and the guitar arrived set up perfectly for me.
customer_reviews.author: GregoryEEEE

customer_reviews.title: finish on this item is beautiful... problem with sound on one of the frets
customer_reviews.text: I have to admit, although there may be a bit of an issue with the curvature of the neck, perhaps from expansion and contraction of wood, customer service at Schecter have been nothing short of spectacular trying to help me work out the buzzing on this one fret!!! Finish is gorgeous... not exact book match of the grain on the front of the guitar, which I am a bit of a sticker about, but pretty nonetheless. Overall, a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Elleffay

customer_reviews.title: Great Guitar and a great price
customer_reviews.text: Not much more praise I can add as to what has been said about this beauty of a Guitar,I did have to make a slight truss rod adjustment but that's typical for many higher end guitars. After that it plays like butter,frets were perfect so no need to get the files out. Its well made from high quality components,Easily the steal of 2011...thanks Amazon for your great price and service.
customer_reviews.author: R Hogan

customer_reviews.title: I know what you're thinking, and the answer is JUST BUY THIS GUITAR
customer_reviews.text: This guitar is absolutely beautiful. The picture is slightly misleading, as it is not as bright red as it shows, but nothing to worry about. And if the inlays seem too flashy, no worries, they look perfect in person. As for tone, out of the box, no amp or anything, sounds amazing. Crisp, clear tone. Through an amp, clean sounds amazing, and with distortion, this guitar is ready to burn down anything you want with its perfect shredability. The neck is thin, easy to play, and the guitar is very light. Perfect for what ever you want to play. I recommend a Line 6 Spyder amp to play on. 100/5 stars no doubt.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: WOW.....just wow
customer_reviews.text: I found this beautiful guitar for 48% off and it was an impulse buy. She was originally going to be a gift but I fell in love with her immediately. The quality is top notch, as to be expected from schecter. She arrived without a scratch and she was almost tuned when I finally got her undressed from the packaging. I have an 8 string schecter and they both are awesome. WORTH EVERY PENNY!!
customer_reviews.author: Ben M.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice guitar!!
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly the same as the Damien Elite-6 except it has the flame fretboard inlay. Otherwise, they are identical. That guitar retails for $729 but practically can be purchased for ~$500. So, I was intrigued to see this at $244 and promptly ordered one. When I received it, I can say this is the best guitar I have ever owned. Very nice and it sounds fantastic. The flame inlay is a lot more subdued than the pictures show. Much more smokey looking as I think one other reviewer stated. The EMG pickups kick butt. Quality is incredible. Overall, I think I am now officially a Schecter fan.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly D. Painter

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Guitar for the price
customer_reviews.text: I have really enjoyed this guitar and it's one of my favorites! Love the action and it stays in tune better than expected. I would recommend a Schecter for anyone that wants a great sounding guitar right out of the box! It looks cool too!
customer_reviews.author: Vegas Cadillac

customer_reviews.title: Holy slapnuggets this is awesome!!!!
customer_reviews.text: What can I say but WOW!! I guess I could say WOWA WEE WOW!!! Just frikkin amazing. The active EMG's in this guitar are great. Looks beautiful with the deep red finish. The pictures don't do it justice. Comfortable to play, and the neck and action are fast and low, respectively. I LOVE IT!!!! Get this baby, while it's still around. The active EMG's alone are worth $200.
customer_reviews.author: Texas Pete

customer_reviews.title: Worth The Money
customer_reviews.text: This was a great deal of a guitar, especially at this price, it arrived in Perfect Condition, felt like it had already been Customized to Me, right out of the box. Took a gamble on getting it while it was so cheap thanks the to other reviews, and a spare christmas gift card, and I figured I could at least pay them back by writing a quick one of my own. Great Guitar at an UNBELIEVABLE price!
customer_reviews.author: Pierson

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this guitar
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this guitar. It does everything that I want and the tone is great. I would highly recommend this guitar for the enthusiast on a budget.
customer_reviews.author: charged1981

customer_reviews.title: best deal i've ever gotten on line!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is without a doubt the best bargain i have ever ran across.This instrument looks and plays like a 2000.00 axe.
customer_reviews.author: ralphf.arms

customer_reviews.title: Weird hollow sound...
customer_reviews.text: I've noticed that when playing there is a hollow sound with every pick, it's hard to describe but it's especially evident when double picking. I really noticed it when me and my drummer were messing around doing some recording and the double picking part just sounded horrible and we couldn't figure what was causing it. We tried different amps, different heads and different cabs but it would not go away.
customer_reviews.author: robert duggan

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Plays extremely well and sounds amazing. The fretboard is smooth and easy to play, surprisingly enough the guitar comes with a decent set of ernie ball strings on it. All i had to do was tune it up and play. I have replaced the strings with Ernie ball Custom slinky and they sound amazing. This guitar was definitely worth every penny. The emg's give you every bit of what you would expect from an active pickup, they sound truly great. You won't regret buying this....
customer_reviews.author: Blackfox

customer_reviews.title: Great guitar!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this at Christmas last year when it was on sale. I love it, i hate to say it but I like this more then my pricier Schecter Hellraiser Solo 6. Great deal when it was on sale, but even at it's current price its still an amazing guitar for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Ethanr2139

customer_reviews.title: Omg.
customer_reviews.text: This guitar is bad a**. For the $ it is well worth it. I was playing some Judas Priest & Iced Earth songs and it was flawless sounding. The guitar itself is beautiful. I can't believe I got it for $100 under normal retail. Just awesome. One note though the inlays are darker in Color than the pic. Pros: price. Cons: none yet.
customer_reviews.author: slayer1987

customer_reviews.title: Awesome axe!!!
customer_reviews.text: Got it as prompted, came ready to play. Just needed a tuning and rocked out some rocksmith. Plays beautifully and looks just as good as it plays. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Lambo

customer_reviews.title: fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Just had this beauty about a month and is perfect Best sound from all my 5 guitars At this price ill be buying it again :$ Buy one And prove why i said :)
customer_reviews.author: Fernando

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Simply awesome my boys love it and the flames look incredible.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Luevano

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!
customer_reviews.text: I can't even begin to explain how happy i am with this guitar. The fret is amazing so easy to slide from a fret to another. I cant stop playing it. You have to get one ASAP!
customer_reviews.author: Cesar

customer_reviews.title: Boyfriend had meorder this for him!
customer_reviews.text: He loves it. Its really beautiful and came very quickly and safely! I am positive he would buy it again if he needed to !!
customer_reviews.author: tazra

customer_reviews.title: Obviously, best guitar under $400
customer_reviews.text: Above $400 you will get good brand pickups, below it very unlikely. It seems like that other products are just problematic, bad pickups, fret work .etc. But this guitar is perfect in all aspect! (I'm not a big fan of how it looks though, but it's perfect to me) It is a discontinuous product, grab one of these.
customer_reviews.author: Harry

customer_reviews.title: All perfect but found......
customer_reviews.text: Well, the guitar is beautiful, very nice. I found 1 litle tiny crack in the union of the body with the neck. It is too small to be considered but it is. The surface all arround the neck is not flat at all, it has little small holes that can not be seen in the pictures of the products. It seems like the maple had bubbles and when was cut and sand the litles holes were not filled. The sound is great and I dont know if this could be affected by those 2 observation in the future. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Luis Pizarro

customer_reviews.title: great playing guitar
customer_reviews.text: didnt have to set it up out of the box its great schector is a fine company with good quality love the emg pick ups! the price was great thank you so much!
customer_reviews.author: leon leontaris

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Nice action. Beautiful finish. Some low fret buzz that took me a while to fix. For the price a steal. I would rank it just behind my Jackson on total performance.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: I recommend
customer_reviews.text: Plays great, what else can I say. I'm transitioning from having only played acoustic for the past 10 years to my first electric. I love the way if feels
customer_reviews.author: JK

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: I want to dip my balls in tomato sauce and put them in pasta. is that weird? the guitar is nice and is mickey mouse
customer_reviews.author: steve

product_meta.title: Schecter Damien Special - Crimson Red
product_meta.description: The Amazon-exclusive Schecter Damien Special in Crimson Red is loaded with features usually not found at this price point. With a Black Pearloid flame inlay, black chrome hardware and EMG active pickups, this is a guitar that looks as great as it sounds.
feature_bullets: Mahogany Body with Solid Maple Top

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.6 out of 5 stars49 ratings3.6 out of 5 stars
